item.description:
Hi,

This place is worth checking out. The lounge has a unique decor and a fun atmosphere complete with pool table. Make sure you check out the online photo gallery. Some members of our meetup group have already been and give it high marks.

From 4 to 7 p.m., The Loft offers their Winter Four-Play Menu. You can order a small dish, flatbread sandwich or salad for $10 or less. This includes one glass of wine or beer, which they pair with your meal!

Oh, parking is a bit tricky. The parking lot is across from the hotel. It is not well lit. Carpool if you can.

RSVP extended to March 9

Come join us!
item.name: Socializing, Food, Drinks and Pool @ The Loft, NYLO Hotel
